scripts.build: prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build
scripts.start: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const fs = require('fs'); const cwd = process.cwd(); const inNext = path.basename(cwd) === '.next'; const root = inNext ? path.resolve(cwd, '..') : cwd; const port = process.env.PORT || '3000'; console.log('[startup] cwd', cwd); console.log('[startup] root', root); console.log('[startup] node', process.version); console.log('[startup] PORT', port); console.log('[startup] root has .next', fs.existsSync(path.join(root, '.next'))); const r = spawnSync(process.platform==='win32'?'npx.cmd':'npx', ['next','start','-H','0.0.0.0','-p', String(port)], { stdio: 'inherit', cwd: root }); process.exit(r.status ?? 1);"
